name: Stack Stuff
description:
You need a place to put all of your stuff. So, why not put it on a raft in the middle of lava!
build a tower of crazy objects as high as possible. Let hilarity ensue as you stack anvils on top of cats.

Controls:
click- to place the object
Q and E to rotate the object
scroll wheel to move up and down

If you encounter any issues restart the game and they should be fixed. If not please leave a comment.

This game was made for Ludum dare 40.
Ludum dare 40 link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/stack-stuff
